attributes.action: Stop car parking charges at hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can go to my local supermarket and park for free but if i or my family are ill I have to pay to attend my local hospital.The out of hours primary Care Centre is situated in the local hospital and if go there by my own transport I have to pay to park but if i require transport which costs the PCT about £40 I pay nothing.Can somebody work out the logic in this.Scrap hospital car park charges as it makes no sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
